text: Bhanidinush masanga aphno nimti pani kunai labhako adhikara chaina, ra na kunai haniko, tara tyati matra jati allahale caheko huncha, ra yadi ma adrsyako kura janne bha'e, maile dherai napha prapta garihalthem ra mala'i kunai noksani hune thi'ena. Ma ta matra saceta gara'une ra subhasamacara dinevala hum, tyasta manisaharula'i jasale imana lya'eka chan
